= List of all Properties =

== Sorted by Property Type ==
* [[owl:DatatypeProperty|List of OWL Datatype Properties]]
* [[owl:ObjectProperty|List of OWL Object Properties]]
* [[owl:AnnotationProperty|List of OWL Annotation Properties]]
* [[rdf:Property|List of RDF Properties]]
<br/><br/>


== List of all Properties ==

{{#widget: TableResult |
query = '
SELECT DISTINCT ?property ?propertyLabel ?propertyType ?superProperty 
WHERE { 
{
{ ?property rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty }
UNION
{ ?property rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty }
UNION
{ ?property rdf:type owl:AnnotationProperty }
UNION
{ ?property rdf:type rdf:Property }
}
?property rdf:type ?propertyType .
OPTIONAL { ?property rdfs:label ?propertyLabel }
OPTIONAL { ?property rdfs:subClassOf ?superProperty }
}' |
labels = 'false'
}}
